text: The 1936-37 season was Aberdeen's 32nd season in the top flight of Scottish football and their 34th season overall. Aberdeen competed in the Scottish League Division One and the Scottish Cup. ==Results== ===Division One=== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" ! Match Day ! Date ! Opponent ! H/A ! Score !
